alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Putnam; Schuyler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:07PM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow and gusty winds reducing visibility to less than one mile. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...In Kansas, Doniphan County. In Missouri, Putnam, Schuyler and Andrew Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
